thread.title: Punk Drugs His Date’s Drink, Has No Idea Bartender Saw It and Swapped Their Glasses!
thread.title_full: Punk Drugs His Date’s Drink, Has No Idea Bartender Saw It and Swapped Their Glasses!

author: Wilmot Proviso
title: Punk Drugs His Date’s Drink, Has No Idea Bartender Saw It and Swapped Their Glasses!
text:
SICK: Cops Bust Porn Star, 18-Year-Old Men… Find Sex Videos With 12-Year-Old Girl 
But we kind of hope it did, and not just because it’s a cool story. 
When he noticed that the date-rape drug had been introduced into the woman’s drink, he observed the two, looking for the right moment. That’s when he pounced. “I’m a bartender,” the anonymous post read. “Last night I saw a guy drug a girl’s drink.” Advertisement - story continues below “When he wasn’t looking I switched the drinks. Watched the guy drug himself.” Now, it’s worth pointing out that the right thing to do in this situation, if you can, is to call the police. After all, while authorities aren’t likely to charge you for saving someone from a rapist , you’re still saving yourself any problem with personal liability if you do so. However, we haven’t heard of this man being charged, and we can only say that this is the perfect retribution for a sick would-be rapist . Advertisement - story continues below
